scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Ms.Hulke
scrape.text: I found this book just ok...I want to give it 2.5 stars instead of 3. I kept wanting to read and find out what happened, which is a plus, but I found the dialogue to be very forced and fake and there was nothing about the characters I found remotely redeeming. The book took dark and twisty turns that I was not anticipating. I think maybe my expectations were too high. I did enjoy the way the plot was organizized like a dinner course. While the book overall was not my favorite, others may enjoy it, particularly those who like darker plot twists with a lot of dialogue.
